columns.name: radiation_therapy_modality
columns.formula:
["Megavoltage radiation therapy using photons (procedure)",        
"Teleradiotherapy using electrons (procedure)",        
"Teleradiotherapy protons (procedure)",       
"Teleradiotherapy neutrons (procedure)",        
"Brachytherapy (procedure)",
"Other"][random(0,5)]

columns.name: reference_radiation_treatment_id
columns.formula:
if radiation_boost == true
then "REFERENCE_RADIATION_TREATMENT_" + this.to_s
else "" end
